name: Western War
description:
Courage and honor are not empty words for the last cowboy in the village, who vowed to take revenge and protect his village from the villain, but he has too huge an army of bandits who certainly want to follow the order of their leader and capture your village!

Western War - This is a 2D rail shooter with a top-down view of shooting enemies, with each level their number and speed increase, and you must use two revolvers to shoot enemies and reload the revolvers in time so as not to end up in the pit for the dead.

Game Features:
-Pixel Art
- Increasing Difficulty
- Agility training
